title: FortaRun Shoes
subtitle: Children Sportswear
description:
For children who aren't tying bunny ears just yet, these kids' adidas running shoes have elastic laces that make them easy to pull on and off. A top strap ensures a snug, secure fit. On the outside, colorful details on the textile upper mean they're easy to spot on the playground. Inside, the soft Cloudfoam midsole supports all their jumps, leaps and skips. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Elastic laces with hook-and-loop top strap; Textile upper; Textile lining; OrthoLite® sockliner; Cloudfoam midsole; Non-marking rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Green Oxide; Product code: GV9473
colors: Core Black / Cloud White / Green Oxide

title: Ultraboost 22 Shoes

title: 4DFWD Pulse 2 Shoes
subtitle: Men's Running
description: Run smooth with these adidas shoes, created using state-of-the-art 3D printing technology, with incredible smoothness, guiding your strides for a more fluid run. The 4DFWD heel is angled to increase impact absorption. Working together with the EVA midsole, this unique design translates into a smooth heel transition at the moment of touchdown while the 3 layered upper is engineered for seamless stretchable support for lateral and linear movements. AEROREADY manages moisture to keep feet feeling dry and comfortable. A rubber outsole provides superb traction for a confident stride. Made in part with recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Lace closure; Engineered mesh upper; Textile lining; 3D-printed 4DFWD midsole; Midsole angled for a smooth run; Weight: 334 g (size UK 8.5); Midsole drop: 11 mm (heel: 23 mm / forefoot: 12 mm); Continental™ Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Carbon; Product code: GX9282

title: S2G BOA Wide Spikeless Golf Shoes
subtitle: Men's Golf
description:
Bring confidence to your game in these adidas golf shoes designed for versatile performance. The Bounce midsole cushioning offers comfort and flexibility through 18 holes and beyond. The V-Traxion outsole delivers solid grip for enhanced stability on variable terrain. The waterproof upper keeps your feet dry on damp fairways, and the BOA® Fit System lets you dial in a precise fit. The spikeless design ensures an easy transition from course to clubhouse. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Wide fit; Micro-adjustable dial-based BOA® Fit System; Waterproof upper; Slow resilient sockliner; Bounce midsole; Adiwear outsole with V-Traxion; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Core Black / Grey Six; Product code: GV9789

title: Superstar Shoes

description: From the basketball court to the classroom. Everyone deserves a pair of adidas Superstars Shoes. This kids' version celebrates 50 years of the classic shell-toe design. Whether they sport all white, all black or something in between, these shoes keep little ones looking fresh.

Debuted on the hardwood. Made famous in hip hop. Worn in every corner of the globe. The adidas Superstar shoes have truly earned the term "iconic." This modern pair has all the essential details, from the serrated 3-Stripes to that legendary rubber shell toe. Modern colors and a lace jewel keep the classic style fresh.

description: The Adilette debuted in 1970 as a shower slide for the German national football team during the world's biggest match in Mexico before being officially released back in '72. It's been a style mainstay of adidas ever since. These slides stay true to the original look with a contoured footbed and 3-Stripes across the bandage upper.

A combined EVA midsole and outsole makes sure every step is cushioned. And rain is no problem here, since the water-repellent finish blocks it out. With these shoes, you're winter ready.

description:
The city is ever-changing. Dare to keep up in these juniors' adidas NMD_R1 Refined Shoes. Merging everyday style with top-tier adidas technology, these running-inspired sneakers keep you comfortably on the move thanks to energy-returning Boost cushioning. The flexible mesh upper hugs the foot so you can easily turn and switch directions anytime a new part of the city calls to you.

This product is made with Primeblue, a high-performance recycled material made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic. 50% of the upper is textile, 75% of the textile is Primeblue yarn. No virgin polyester.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Mesh upper; Boost midsole; Rubber outsole; Primeblue; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Grey One; Product code: H02334
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Cloud White

description:
The future is now. The original running-inspired style that made you love the adidas NMD_R1 shoes gets updates to make you look and feel like you walked right out of a time machine. Modern overlays give these juniors' kicks a cyberpunk vibe. Long commutes and slick city sidewalks are no problem, thanks to BOOST cushioning and the grippy rubber outsole beneath your feet.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Lace closure; Textile upper; Textile lining; BOOST midsole; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Core Black; Product code: HP2939
colors: Core Black / Cloud White / Core Black

description:
Flashy and exuberant — two words that reflect Gilbert Arenas' style on and off the hardwood. These signature adidas basketball shoes live up to that intent with tiger-print details and his signoffs on the heel and tongue. A BOOST drop-in responds to every move, and outsole pods give you the lateral traction you need to change directions like Agent Gil.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Leather upper; Textile lining; BOOST midsole; Ground Control System outsole pods; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Pantone / Core Black / Vivid Green; Product code: GY2415
colors: Pantone / Core Black / Vivid Green

description: The look you know and love, just on a bold platform outsole. It's only one change, and yet it makes all the difference to these adidas Stan Smith shoes. The elevated outsole stands out even more with double-layered foxing tape to create extra emphasis on the proportions. The smooth, luxe upper adds a premium element to the look, making them the perfect balance of high and low, and the perfect shoe to go with everything.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Synthetic upper; Textile lining; Memory foam sockliner; Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Linen Green / Linen Green / Almost Lime; Product code: GY9343
colors: Cloud White / Cloud White / Green

details: Imported; Product color: Scarlet / Pulse Amber / Core Black; Product code: GY0328

description:
Can't decide between retro and right-now? With the adidas Retropy, you get both. These juniors' shoes have a modern, pared-down look with pops of nostalgic style. Track-inspired styling gives them that casual, easy-to-wear vibe. A soft cushioned outsole will take you as far as you want to go.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g., cutting scraps and post-consumer household waste, to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Lace closure; Textile upper with suede and mesh overlays; OrthoLite® sockliner; EVA midsole; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Core Black; Product code: GW3313
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Cloud White
